TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat this Ogre. You must find another one.
You package up the defeated Ogre ready to take to Drong's Tower.
Drong pays you well and gives you a magic cloak.
Travel to Gork and defeat an Ogre then take it back to Drong.
You must return to Drong's Tower with the Ogre.
You will need a BIG Ogre to feed Drong. This one is big, but he looks extra tough.
